name: Chocolate Banana Bread Pudding
author: Gabrielle
summary: A local restaurant served a version of this recipe. I went crazy over it and decided to create my own. It's great served warm or cold.
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
In a large mixing bowl, mix eggs, milk, sugar, and vanilla until smooth
Stir in bread, bananas, and chocolate chips, and let rest 5 minutes for bread to soak
Line a roasting pan with a damp kitchen towel
Place loaf pan on towel inside roasting pan, and place roasting pan on oven rack
Fill roasting pan with water to reach halfway up the sides of the loaf pan
Bake in preheated oven for 1 hour, or until a knife inserted in the center comes out clean
